title: Insight
alt: The great thing is, the sentence is really just a reminder to the listener to worry about whatever aspects of the technology they're already feeling alarmist about, which in their mind gives you credit for addressing their biggest anxieties.
transcript:
[White Hat is holding a finger up while talking to Cueball.]
White Hat: 
Maybe before we rush to adopt 
<Google Glass> 
we should stop to consider the consequences of blithely giving this technology such a central position in our lives.[Caption below the panel:]
Don't have any insights about a new technology? Just use this sentence! 
It makes you sound wise and you can say it about virtually anything.
